name: Eggbert II
description:
Eggbert is a Puzzle Game in which you have to keep alive a mysterious egg untill it hatches. 
Evil wiverns (wtf?) are wondering in the map attacking randomly around them. 
Each turn you have the possibility to rotate one wivern trying to make it hit other wiverns but more importantly avoiding the egg!**

How to play

- click wivern and rotate ( 1 each turn ) or skip the turn
- make the egg survive untill it hatches

The Team 

Andrea Teruzzi - Design / Programming

Marco Marchitelli - Programming / Graphics 

Andrea Ancona - Design

Details

Game for Ludum Dare 46 “Keep it alive”

Audio was royalty free and downloaded online.
